text: Integrated coeducational secondary school that offers secondary education leading to GCE Ordinary or Normal level with emphasis on skills and values to meet future challenges. With professional yet warm and approachable staffs and teachers in an atmosphere of greenery and fresh air away from the busy cityscapes. Conveniently located in the neighbourhood heartland next to Sheng Siong supermarket Jurong Spring Community Centre Boon Lay Shopping Centre Pioneer Mall Boon Lay Secondary School River Valley High School few bus stops from Boon Lay MRT station and bus interchange at Jurong Point with plenty of dinning shopping supermarket banking library postage community centre cinemas entertainment and amenities nearby. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for students tourists expats locals visitors and families.
